name: CREATETHE GROUP
tag_list: digital, agency, luxury, fashion, commerce, e-commerce, platform, cms, merchandising, storefront, retail, creative-commerce
overview:
CREATETHE GROUP partners with forward-thinking brands to deliver innovative and emotional campaigns, communications platforms and commerce solutions that maintain the highest levels of brand integrity in digital, mobile, social media and emerging technologies, that create powerful connections with consumers and drive business results.

Headquartered in New York City with offices in London, CREATETHE GROUPâ€™s employs more than 250 employees with a client roster of 70 leading global brands including Alexander Wang, Bulgari, Burberry, David Yurman, DeBeers, Donna Karan, DKNY, dunhill, Fendi, H&M, Jurlique, kate spade new york, La Perla, Louis Vuitton, Marc Jacobs, NARS, Neiman Marcus, NOWNESS, Oscar de la Renta, Tom Ford and Vichy.

In 2011 CREATETHE GROUP was featured in Fast Companyâ€™s â€œ50 Most Innovative Companiesâ€ issue, ranking #5 in the Fashion Industry, and won Webby & Clio Awards for NOWNESS.com.

CREATETHE GROUP acquired Morpheus Media in June 2011, a world-class strategic digital media services agency offering display media, paid search, natural search optimization, social media management, mobile and pay-for-performance marketing.

CTS PLATFORM is a next-generation digital commerce platform, powers digital flagship experiences and seamlessly integrates global commerce and community functions with uniquely branded content. Its flexible front-end supports branded innovation without the limitations of traditional platforms. The managed Cloud infrastructure provides enterprise performance, scalability and security. Supporting businesses across North America, Europe and Asia, CTS PLATFORM features integrated content management, social shopping and cutting-edge business tools, including promotions, merchandising and reporting.

funding_rounds.source_description: CreateThe Group lands $12M for e-commerce platforms
